title: New: REFS – Pain Goes Away
body:
Really funky debut from NY duo, **REFS**, featuring production from Andrew Maury (Ra Ra Riot, RAC, Panama Wedding), already rocketing up the Hype Machine chart.

_Pain Goes Away_ sits somewhere between the upbeat, indie pop of recent years, and the super slick R&B that’s dominated blogs recently. Check it out below.
